about_the_game:
Wizard Hand is a magical solitaire roguelike about accumulating the maximum number of magical points by mastering the art of combining enchanted cards, transformations, and a collection of magical items.

The Wizard Hand Demo showcases the game's core mechanics, including:

🔮 Over 20 Artifacts that multiply points and have a lot of useful effects
✨15+ Crystals – Contain crafting recipes to temporarily transform cards
👁️ Pyramid Guardians – Mysterious entities that use their power to stop you
🃏 Enchanted Cards – Build your own magical deck and use cards in unexpected ways
⚔️ Bosses – Unique challenges that force you to rethink your strategy
🔼 Card Upgrades – Every card in your deck can be made stronger
🔥 Streak Mechanic – Chain combinations to stack even greater result

The full game expands on this foundation with a vast array of artifacts and crafting recipes that unlock between runs, ensuring each new attempt feels fresh. It will also introduce playable characters, each with unique abilities, along with even more enchanted cards and formidable bosses to challenge your mastery of magical solitaire.

The goal of the game is to remove the entire pyramid of cards from the table, while scoring the maximum points. Play a matching card onto the pyramid card to start a combo! The more points you have, the more opportunities you have to expand your magical arsenal and be ready for future challenges!


Play a matching card onto the pyramid card to start a combo!

The more similar the cards are to each other, the more initial points the player will receive for the combo. Then use all your magical tools to get as many points as you can for the combo you're playing! And don't hold back - the bonuses increase with each combination in a row.

Unleash the full potential of your cards

Each card can be used in various amount of combos, transformed into another, or serve as host for powerful enchantments. And don't hesitate to upgrade the rank of your cards to unlock their full potential! 

Expand your deck with a vast variety of enchanted cards

Expand your deck with a vast variety of enchanted cards. Use those magic abilities to adapt the pyramid to your needs. Change the cards in the pyramid or in your hand as you see fit, avoiding the guard spells and discovering other ways to use enchantments. You’re going to need every edge you can get in order to secure victory.

Adapt and overcome the ever-changing challenges

With each level of the pyramid, guardians with unique traits will appear, requiring an unconventional approach. Don't underestimate their defensive abilities, they can cause a lot of havoc on the field and mess up your plans.

But with a well-thought-out strategy, Guardians can even work in your favor.

Explore the ultimate collection of powerful artifact

Collect your ultimate collection of powerful artifacts. Each one of them will change the way you play the game. Choose them carefully to create your unique build. Figure out how they all work together with each other and with the rest of the game's mechanics.

Choose the best crafting recipes that suit your gaming style

Crafting recipes sealed in magic crystals allows you to change cards in your hand right during the middle of a game round, giving you unique flexibility when deciding on your next move. No matching card in your hand and not enough of the right kind of enchantment? No problem, just use the cards you have as ingredients to create the ones you need. And don't be afraid to experiment, because at the end of the round, all the created cards will return to their original form.

Unlock new possibilities with each playthrough. Plan the most powerful and lengthy combos, using your magical deck to its fullest potential.

short_description: Wizard Hand is a magical deckbuilder game where solitaire meets roguelike. You play solitaire by using your magical cards to uncover dazzling combos and accumulate magical points with the help of enchantments, crafting, and a collection of powerful artifacts.
